  holder,
  the_level 
)
Value:
BOOST_LOG_USE_LOG(l, read_msg().gather().out(),                           \
        holder->is_enabled(::boost::logging::level::the_level) &&             \
        saga::detail::module_needs_logging(                                   \
            BOOST_PP_STRINGIZE(SAGA_MANGLED_MODULE_NAME)))                    \
